definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: You only got to say she was blankly?
sentences.chinese: 照说这姑娘还真是直肠子。

sentences.english: This was supposed to be the year.
But I was supposed to want to have a baby.
sentences.chinese: 但是照说我应当想生孩子的。

sentences.english: They should be home by now.
sentences.chinese: 照说他们现在应当已经到家了。

definition: to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
according to reason/in the ordinary course of events/normally
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
to laugh involuntarily/Taiwan pr. [e4 ran2 shi1 xiao4]
in the ordinary course of events/ordinarily/normally
to laugh in spite of oneself/to be unable to help laughing/to break into laughter
